class.name: AudioStreamGeneratorPlayback
class.description: This class is meant to be used with [AudioStreamGenerator] to play back the generated audio in real-time.

link.title: Godot 3.2 will get new audio features

method.name: can_push_buffer
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if a buffer of the size [param amount] can be pushed to the audio sample data buffer without overflowing it, [code]false[/code] otherwise.

method.name: clear_buffer
method.description: Clears the audio sample data buffer.

method.name: get_frames_available
method.description: Returns the number of frames that can be pushed to the audio sample data buffer without overflowing it. If the result is [code]0[/code], the buffer is full.

method.name: get_skips
method.description: Returns the number of times the playback skipped due to a buffer underrun in the audio sample data. This value is reset at the start of the playback.

method.name: push_buffer
method.description: Pushes several audio data frames to the buffer. This is usually more efficient than [method push_frame] in C# and compiled languages via GDExtension, but [method push_buffer] may be [i]less[/i] efficient in GDScript.

method.name: push_frame
method.description: Pushes a single audio data frame to the buffer. This is usually less efficient than [method push_buffer] in C# and compiled languages via GDExtension, but [method push_frame] may be [i]more[/i] efficient in GDScript.
